# Pull Request Template

Thank you for contributing to HealthAI 2030! Please provide the following information to help us review your changes.

## 📋 Pull Request Type

Please select the type of change you're making:

- [ ] **Bug Fix** - Fixes an existing issue
- [ ] **Feature** - Adds a new feature
- [ ] **Enhancement** - Improves existing functionality
- [ ] **Documentation** - Updates documentation
- [ ] **Refactoring** - Code refactoring without functional changes
- [ ] **Performance** - Performance improvements
- [ ] **Security** - Security enhancements
- [ ] **Testing** - Adds or updates tests
- [ ] **Other** - Other changes

## 🔗 Related Issues

Closes #[issue number]
Related to #[issue number]

## 📝 Description

A clear and concise description of what this pull request does.

### Problem
What problem does this solve?

### Solution
How does this solve the problem?

### Impact
What is the impact of this change?

## 🧪 Testing

### Test Coverage
- [ ] Unit tests added/updated
- [ ] Integration tests added/updated
- [ ] UI tests added/updated
- [ ] Performance tests added/updated
- [ ] All existing tests pass

### Manual Testing
- [ ] Tested on iOS simulator
- [ ] Tested on macOS
- [ ] Tested on watchOS (if applicable)
- [ ] Tested on tvOS (if applicable)
- [ ] Tested on physical devices
- [ ] Tested accessibility features
- [ ] Tested security features

### Test Results
```
# Paste test output here
```

## 📱 Platform Compatibility

- [ ] **iOS 18.0+** - Tested and compatible
- [ ] **macOS 15.0+** - Tested and compatible
- [ ] **watchOS 11.0+** - Tested and compatible (if applicable)
- [ ] **tvOS 18.0+** - Tested and compatible (if applicable)

## 🔒 Security & Compliance

### Security Review
- [ ] No sensitive data exposed in logs or error messages
- [ ] Input validation implemented where needed
- [ ] Authentication/authorization properly implemented
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or credentials
- [ ] Security best practices followed

### Compliance Check
- [ ] HIPAA compliance maintained
- [ ] GDPR compliance maintained
- [ ] Privacy controls properly implemented
- [ ] Data handling follows security guidelines

## 📊 Performance Impact

### Performance Testing
- [ ] Performance benchmarks run
- [ ] Memory usage analyzed
- [ ] Battery impact assessed
- [ ] Network usage optimized
- [ ] No performance regressions

### Performance Metrics
- **Before**: [performance metrics]
- **After**: [performance metrics]
- **Improvement**: [percentage or description]

## ♿ Accessibility

### Accessibility Testing
- [ ] VoiceOver compatibility tested
- [ ] Dynamic Type support verified
- [ ] High contrast mode tested
- [ ] Reduced motion support verified
- [ ] Accessibility labels added where needed

### WCAG Compliance
- [ ] WCAG 2.1 AA compliance maintained
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works properly
- [ ] Screen reader compatibility verified
- [ ] Color contrast meets standards

## 📚 Documentation

### Code Documentation
- [ ] Public APIs documented with DocC
- [ ] Complex logic commented
- [ ] README updated if needed
- [ ] Architecture diagrams updated if needed

### User Documentation
- [ ] User-facing changes documented
- [ ] API documentation updated
- [ ] Migration guide provided if needed
- [ ] Release notes prepared

## 🔧 Code Quality

### Code Standards
- [ ] SwiftLint passes without warnings
- [ ] SwiftFormat applied
- [ ] Code follows project style guide
- [ ] No TODO/FIXME comments left
- [ ] Error handling implemented

### Architecture
- [ ] Follows existing architecture patterns
- [ ] No circular dependencies introduced
- [ ] Proper separation of concerns
- [ ] Modular design maintained

## 🚀 Deployment

### Build & Deploy
- [ ] Builds successfully on all platforms
- [ ] No build warnings
- [ ] CI/CD pipeline passes
- [ ] Deployment tested in staging

### Release Readiness
- [ ] Version numbers updated
- [ ] Changelog updated
- [ ] Release notes prepared
- [ ] Breaking changes documented

## 📋 Checklist

Before submitting, please ensure:

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] All tests pass
- [ ] No linting errors or warnings
- [ ] Code is properly documented
- [ ] Error handling is implemented

### Security & Compliance
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Compliance requirements met
- [ ] Privacy controls maintained
- [ ] No sensitive data exposed

### Testing & Validation
- [ ] Comprehensive testing completed
- [ ] Performance impact assessed
- [ ] Accessibility verified
- [ ] Cross-platform compatibility confirmed

### Documentation
- [ ] Code documentation updated
- [ ] User documentation updated
- [ ] API documentation updated
- [ ] Release notes prepared

## 📸 Screenshots

If applicable, add screenshots to show the changes:

### Before
[Add screenshot of the current state]

### After
[Add screenshot of the new state]

## 🔍 Review Notes

Any additional information for reviewers:

- **Breaking Changes**: List any breaking changes
- **Migration Steps**: Steps needed to migrate from old version
- **Known Issues**: Any known issues or limitations
- **Future Improvements**: Suggestions for future enhancements

## 📞 Contact

If you need assistance with this pull request:

- **Email**: support@healthai2030.com
- **Slack**: #healthai2030-dev
- **Documentation**: [docs.healthai2030.com](https://docs.healthai2030.com)
